_meta.title: forest_a six baselines, 20 runs, reverse-recovery MPC
_meta.summary: Evaluate A*, A*-MPC, Hybrid A*, Hybrid A*-MPC, RRT*, and RRT-MPC on forest_a with fixed random pairs and reverse-recovery enabled for MPC tracking.
notes: Use --rand-pairs-json /tmp/forest_a_pairs20_from_20260207_004053.json to compare against the original 20-pair benchmark fairly.
Reverse-recovery is MPC-only and uses conservative triggering: near-obstacle + no-progress + short forward collision prediction.
Planner fallback to Hybrid A* is disabled by default for strict baseline attribution; enable only for robustness studies.
